Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authority of the commissioner of general services to transfer and convey certain lands to the city of New Rochelle
Summary: Extends the authority of the commissioner of general services to transfer and convey certain lands to the city of New Rochelle until December 31, 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 566 of the laws of 2019, authorizing the commissioner of general services to transfer and convey certain state land to the city of New Rochelle, in relation to extending the authority of the commissioner of general services to transfer and convey certain lands to the city of New Rochelle
